marker.ph: <<ContentPage.Content> <views:ExtendedListView ItemsSource="{Binding Pages}" IsRefreshing="{Binding IsBusy}" ItemSelectedCommand="{Binding PageSelectedCmd}" ShouldHiglightSelected="false" HasUnevenRows="false" SeparatorVisibility="None" RowHeight="88"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <StackLayout BackgroundColor="Aquamarine"> <Label Text="{Binding DisplayName}" TextColor="##000000"/> </StackLayout> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </views:ExtendedListView> </ContentPage.Content>.../>

<<views:ExtendedListView ItemsSource="{Binding Pages}" IsRefreshing="{Binding IsBusy}" Tapped="" ShouldHiglightSelected="false" HasUnevenRows="false" SeparatorVisibility="None" RowHeight="88"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <!--Todo cell--> <Grid Margin="16,8,13,0" RowSpacing="0" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" BackgroundColor="Navy"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Grid.Row="0" Text="{Binding Name}" TextColor="##ffffff"/> <Label Grid.Row="1" Text="{Binding Description}" TextColor="##ffffff"/> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </views:ExtendedListView>.../>

<<ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Label Text="{Binding DisplayName}" TextColor="##000000" VerticalOptions="Center" Margin="16,16"/> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>.../>

<<DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <!--Todo cell--> <Grid Margin="16,8,13,0" RowSpacing="0" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" BackgroundColor="Navy"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Grid.Row="0" Text="{Binding Name}" TextColor="##ffffff"/> <Label Grid.Row="1" Text="{Binding Description}" TextColor="##ffffff"/> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate>.../>

<<Grid RowSpacing="0"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <views:GradientView Grid.Row="0" StartColor="##00ff00" EndColor="##0000ff"/> <Label Grid.Row="0" Text="Default orientation = horizontal" VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> <views:GradientView Grid.Row="1" StartColor="##00ff00" EndColor="##0000ff" Orientation="Vertical"/> <Label Grid.Row="1" Text="Vertical orientation" VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> <Button Grid.Row="2" Clicked="Handle_Clicked" Text="Click to navigate" BackgroundColor="Fuchsia"/> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <views:GradientView Grid.Row="0" StartColor="##00ff00" EndColor="##0000ff"/> <Label Grid.Row="0" Text="Default orientation = horizontal" VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> <views:GradientView Grid.Row="1" StartColor="##00ff00" EndColor="##0000ff" Orientation="Vertical"/> <Label Grid.Row="1" Text="Vertical orientation" VerticalOptions="Center" HorizontalOptions="Center" /> <Button Grid.Row="2" Clicked="Handle_Clicked" Text="Click to navigate" BackgroundColor="Fuchsia"/>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" />.../>
